title: What is the purpose of a domestic support obligation worksheet. The trustee required me to fill this out with my Ex wife's info.
question: What do they do with this and what are the consequences?
answers: The trustees all have reporting requirements when it comes to child support obligations, and that worksheet provides them with the information that they need to meet those reporting requirements. It does not have anything to do with whether you are current on the support or have any bearing on the outcome of your bankruptcy case.

The Trustee must turn in the DSO information to the UST in order to conclude your case as part of the requirements of Bankruptcy law.

Your case will be dismissed if you don't comply with this requirement.
